title: rAja rAja gOpAla
sahitya:
rAja rAja gOpAla (shrI) bAla vraja rAja tanaya anurAgamudita maya rAsa naTana vraja nArI sahita (mama) 


anupallavi

  tEja shyAmaLa vilOla vilOcana tribhuvana prakaTita kAraNa sharIra muraLIdhara karAngulI naTana jAla 


caraNam    shrI ramaNa vashAtIta gOvardhana sAnudEsha vipina sanchAra ati kOmaLa lOlana vAsantee mAgati mAlati jAti mAlikAdhara
vilAsa vraja jana samAgama naTana mAlasa Ayuta kaishOra vAsita rallaka rucira kanakamaya vAsa marmara calana gambhIra
